title: Aahaa Enbargal Song Lyrics Vaseegara
stanzas:
Perazhai endrethaan
pen avalai sonnaalo
suriyanai pirai endru
solluvadhai polaagum

aahaa enbaargal
adadaa enbaargal
avalai paartha ellorum
moondre vinaadi avalai
kandaale avalai nenjai
thaakkum minsaaram

moochu vidum roja poo
paarthadhillai yaarumthaan
avalai vandhu paarthaale
andha kurai theerum thaan

padhinaezhu vayadhu
mudhal varum
padhinettu vayadhu
varai perum
maatrangal aththaniyum
aval azhagai kootti viduthe

paarvaikku patta idam
mangum
paarkkaamal vitta
idam engum
aadhaamin vannam adhu
pongum
kangalukkul suduthe

Por kappal pola iru imai
meen thotti pola iru vizhi
paal sippi pola iru idhazh
serndha azhagi avalthaan

mingaantham pola oru mugam
oosippoo pola oru idai
kandathoon pola oru udal
konda mangai avalthaan

aval azhagendra vaarthaiku
agaraathithaan
naan solgindra ellaame
oru paadhithaan

aahaa enbaargal
adadaa enbaargal
avalai paartha ellorum
moondre vinaadi avalai
kandaale avalai nenjai
thaakkum minsaaram

moochu vidum roja poo
paarthadhillai yaarumthaan
avalai vandhu paarthaale
andha kurai theerum thaan

seo.title: Aahaa Enbargal Song Lyrics Vaseegara
seo.description: Get the complete Aahaa Enbargal Song Lyrics Vaseegara from Vaseegara. composed by S.A.Rajkumar and sung by Shankar Mahadevan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vaseegara, S.A.Rajkumar, Shankar Mahadevan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
